retail.title: Retail trader
retail.problem: Manual trading falls prey to emotion.
retail.solution: Agent trades only when risk rules pass zk check.

quant.title: Quant-curious user
quant.solution: Prebuilt agent, enforceable constraints, zero custody.

custody.question: Do you take custody?
custody.answer: No. Your assets remain in your brokerage account at all times. ReFi.Trading agents execute trades through read-only API connections, ensuring you maintain full control and ownership of your funds.

brokers.question: Which brokers are supported?
brokers.answer: We currently support Interactive Brokers, TD Ameritrade, E*TRADE, Charles Schwab, and Fidelity. Additional broker integrations are added based on user demand and technical compatibility.

agents.question: How do agents decide to trade?
agents.answer: Our ReFinityÂ© agents use ensemble reinforcement learning (PPO, TD3, RVI-Q) with reward centering and MetaOptimize tuning. They continuously adapt to market conditions while respecting your predefined risk parameters.

risk.question: What risk controls are enforced?
risk.answer: Every trade must pass a zero-knowledge proof verification before execution. This includes Value-at-Risk (VaR) limits, position sizing constraints, and drawdown caps that you set. No trade can violate these mathematically proven limits.
